page.title: 03Boggis Electric
page.content: My dad works in an electrical shop. Six people work in the shop. In the big room in the back the men mend things like cookers and washing machines. The showroom contains things like washing machines, heaters and toasters. On a Saturday morning I help sort papers telling that Dad paid all the things he bought. My Mum puts the prices on things in the showroom. A lot of time my Dad is called away on jobs far away and we go along and eat dinner in the car. I think he is very clever and can do a lot. The shop was once a garage. At the back there is a carpark. You can fit 13 carsin there. Also there is some junk at the back of the shop. Scott and Wendy Reeves
